title: Estimote Location Beacons Developer Kit
feature: Accompanied with temperature, motion, light sensors magnetometer, RTC, GPIO slot and 1Mb prom
Simultaneous advertising of multiple packets beacon or eddy stone
5 year default battery life, (3 years as beacon), replaceable battery
Fully customizable settings (broadcasting power, advertising interval, UUID, etc.) and range up to 2
Water resistant and reusable enclosures, ROHs compliant
description: estimote location beacons are the most robust beacons on the market. They are specifically tailored for estimote indoor location SDK, iota prototyping and enterprise-grade deployments. estimote location beacon can broadcast multiple packets simultaneously and support beacon and eddy stone protocols. They are equipped with several sensors: A high-end accelerometer with motion detection features, ambient temperature and light sensor and magnetometer. Additionally location beacons feature a real-time clock, GPIO output and NFC tag. The cell battery power enables over 5 years battery life on default, 3 years as beacon and have a range of up to 200 meters.
